content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
No new structures have been successfully created on the map. Although several steps attempted to place and craft a Lab at (0.5, 2.5), all such attempts failed due to inventory and resource shortages. References to furnaces (an iron furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) and a copper furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)) indicate that these pre-existing structures were used for smelting but were not constructed by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Usage Errors with get_entities  
  – Call get_entities with the correct parameters. Do not include unexpected keywords (such as "radius") or extra positional arguments.

• Lab Placement and Inventory Verification  
  – Before attempting to place a Lab, confirm that a Lab item is present in the inventory to avoid placement failures.

• NoneType Iteration  
  – Verify that functions returning collections (e.g., get_entities) do not return None before iterating over their results.

• Resource Shortages in Lab Crafting  
  – Ensure that all required sub-ingredients (iron-gear-wheel, electronic-circuit, copper-cable, copper-plate) are available prior to initiating Lab crafting. Address each missing component by appropriately increasing smelting or crafting operations as needed.
